content.prompt: The Open Door policy in China called for which of the following?

choices.label: A consortium of nations to govern China
International acknowledgement of Chinaâ€™s right to exclude the trade of any nation
Recognition of Chinese territorial gains in Manchuria
Reduction of foreign tariffs on Chinese goods
Equal commercial access by all nations to the existing spheres of influence in China

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
